Cancellations via electronic mail, voicemail, any social media direct message or text message will not be taken and you will be charged.</p>\r\n<p>If you would like to cancel a class after it has been booked, you must do so more than 12 hours before your scheduled class time. You can cancel your reservation by logging onto your account and selecting the &ldquo;Cancel&rdquo; option next to your upcoming class. If you do not cancel at least 12 hours before the start of class, your session will not be returned to your account, and you will be charged a $10 late fee. If you do not show up, you will be charge a $20 no-show fee. If you cancel with 60 minutes of class time, you will lose your session and be charge a $15 late cancel fee.&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p>If you add yourself to the waitlist, you are solely responsible for managing your bookings and for cancelling your reservation within the bounds of the cancellation policy. Please be aware that the system will automatically add you into a class from the waitlist up to three hours before the class start time, so if you will not be able to attend, you must remove yourself from the waitlist.</p>\r\n<p>Surge Cycling front desk staff will release all open bikes one minute prior to the start of class to those on the standby list. You may cancel this contract at any time before midnight of this third operating day after receiving a copy of this contract. If you choose to cancel this contract you must either:</p>\r\n<p>1.
